unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Must for farmers like Ramlal in UP. Heard stories of hailstorms on 20/05/2023 wiping out entire mango orchards. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana, right? Is it actually helpful when the loss assessment happens on 10/06/2023? Rs. 5000 per acre is peanuts if the crop fails. 15/08 we celebrate, but farmers need support *before* the celebrations! Need better implementation, yaar.
